settings.title: The Story Behind yeedi
settings.content:
Born in 2019, yeedi focuses on how to utilize technology to make life easier instead of pursing the ultimate technology breakthrough.
We found the predicament in the robot vacuum industry: The more advanced the robot vacuum is, the higher its price becomes. In the belief that everyone deserves to enjoy the benefits of technological improvement, we bridge the gap between advancement and price to bring smart home cleaning products to more homes.

settings.title: Our Mission
settings.content: Help global customers maintain a clean and healthy home by creating reliable and easy-to-use smart cleaning products.

settings.title: Live Smart, Live Simple
settings.content: We offer fully functional, easy-to-use and reasonably-priced smart cleaning products for every customer searching for a solution to free them from tedious floor cleaning chores. So they can focus on what matters most.

settings.title: yeedi Is Around You All Over the World
settings.content: yeedi is available in over 20 countries. You can get it over top e-commerce platforms, retailers and distributors.
